text: Carmen Stănescu (29 July 1925 – 11 April 2018) was a Romanian actress. She was born in Bucharest.Actrița Carmen Stănescu împlinește 90 de ani (agerpres.ro) She was known for her roles in The Boors, Premiera, and Kingdom in the Clouds. Stănescu died of cardiopulmonary arrest on 11 April 2018 in Snagov, Romania at the age of 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiopulmonary arrest Category:Romanian movie actors Category:Romanian stage actors Category:Actors from Bucharest
title: Carmen Stănescu
